dct_title_s: To the right honourable John Lord Sommers, Baron of Evesham in ye county of Worcester, president of her Majesty's most honourable Privy Council &c : this map of North America according to ye newest and most exact observations is most humbly dedicated
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Cartouche designed by: B. Lens. Cartouche engraved by: G. Vertue. Insets include 10 maps of harbors and 1 scene of cod processing in Newfoundland. Plate no. 7 from: The world described, or, a new and correct sett of maps / Herman Moll. London : J. Bowles, [1709-1720].
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : Sold by H. Moll over against Deverux [sic] Court in ye Strand [and] Printed for I. Bowles ... T. Bowles ... P. Overton ..., [1720]
dct_subject_sm: New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—Maps—Early works to 1800
